00031 struct Transform {
00032 public:
00033   inline Transform();
00034   virtual ~Transform() { };
00035   virtual double mapX( double x ) const;
00036   virtual double mapY( double y ) const = 0;
00037   virtual void apply( double & x, double & y ) const;
00038   virtual double scale( double x ) const;
00039   virtual double rounded( double x ) const;
00040   virtual void setBoundingBox( const Rect & rect,
00041                                const double pageWidth,
00042                                const double pageHeight,
00043                                const double margin ) = 0;
00044 
00045   static inline double round( const double & x );
00046 
00047 protected:
00048   double _scale;
00049   double _deltaX;
00050   double _deltaY;
00051   double _height;
00052 };

00059 struct TransformEPS : public Transform {
00060 public:
00061   double mapY( double y ) const;
00062   void setBoundingBox( const Rect & rect,
00063                        const double pageWidth,
00064                        const double pageHeight,
00065                        const double margin );
00066 };

00073 struct TransformFIG : public Transform {
00074 public:
00075   inline TransformFIG();
00076   double rounded( double x ) const;
00077   double mapY( double y ) const;
00078   int mapWidth( double width ) const; 
00079   void setBoundingBox( const Rect & rect,
00080                        const double pageWidth,
00081                        const double pageHeight,
00082                        const double margin );
00083   void setDepthRange( const ShapeList & shapes );
00084   int mapDepth( int depth ) const;
00085 private:
00086   int _maxDepth;
00087   int _minDepth;
00088 };
